metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010263 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Perl Crypt::JWT prior to 0.023 is affected by: Incorrect Access Control. The impact is: allow attackers to bypass authentication by providing a token by crafting with hmac(). The component is: JWT.pm, line 614. The attack vector is: network connectivity. The fixed version is: after commit b98a59b42ded9f9e51b2560410106207c2152d6c.

criterions.comment: libcrypt-jwt-perl package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
